Terms & Conditions To enable Touch ID for sign in, you are required to save your User ID on this device.\", secondString: \" Once Touch ID is enabled, you understand and agree that any Touch ID fingerprint stored on this device can be used to access your accounts in Lifecycle Health mobile app. Lifecycle Health Inc. neither controls the functionality of Touch ID nor has access to your fingerprint information. There may be circumstances where Touch ID will not functions as expected and we may ask you to sign in using any username and password. By choosing Accept, you agree to these terms and conditions. Choose Decline to cancel set up of Touch ID for Lifecycle Health mobile app.
